comments.body: design choice by the tools team to allow for multiple -p parameters.
This should be fixed with a custom arg processor in {{configure()}}.
Commit {{03b0e42}} fixes this for both euform-create-stack and euform-update-stack.  The option now accepts semicolon-delimited lists, while still allowing one to use it more than once as before.

Tested and confirmed that either parameters with semicolon-delimented lists or separate options work.  Testing below:

{code}
# euca-version
euca2ools 3.1.0-42-g84e4072 (Omega)
eucalyptus 4.0.2

# yum list eucalyptus
Loaded plugins: fastestmirror, security
Loading mirror speeds from cached hostfile
 * extras: yum.tamu.edu
Installed Packages
eucalyptus.x86_64                                   4.0.2-0.0.22283.42.20141014git6f021f0.el6                                   @eucalyptus

[root@odc-c-11 ~]# euform-create-stack --template-file cfn-example.json --parameter "UbuntuImageId=emi-282a93ff;Acct1User01KeyPair=account2-user11" DockerStack --region account2-user11@
arn:aws:cloudformation::763039098776:stack/DockerStack/e56f6f5d-5689-4a2f-941e-ccc398ffafaf

[root@odc-c-11 ~]# euform-create-stack --template-file cfn-example.json --parameter "UbuntuImageId=emi-282a93ff" --parameter "Acct1User01KeyPair=account2-user11" DockerStack2 --region account2-user11@
arn:aws:cloudformation::763039098776:stack/DockerStack2/3dfefa05-6b7f-441a-915d-aa2816112aea

[root@odc-c-11 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region account2-user11@
STACK	DockerStack2	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Cloudformation Example => Run instance with userdata in security group	2014-10-15T03:41:02.912Z
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-42ebc564
OUTPUT	AZ	cloud11-cluster
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.104.7.60
STACK	DockerStack	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Cloudformation Example => Run instance with userdata in security group	2014-10-15T03:39:57.178Z
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-ae4e06e0
OUTPUT	AZ	cloud11-cluster
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.104.7.51

[root@odc-c-11 ~]# euca-describe-instances --region account2-user11@
RESERVATION	r-83034053	763039098776	default
INSTANCE	i-e6be4d37	emi-282a93ff			terminated	account2-user11	0		m1.xlarge	2014-10-15T02:46:56.024Z	cloud11-cluster				monitoring-disabled					instance-store					hvm			sg-b6941232				x86_64
RESERVATION	r-05d67d86	763039098776	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-FPL35DPY8UEUM
INSTANCE	i-ae4e06e0	emi-282a93ff	10.104.7.51	172.18.228.28	running	account2-user11	0		m1.xlarge	2014-10-15T03:39:59.900Z	cloud11-cluster				monitoring-disabled	10.104.7.51	172.18.228.28			instance-store					hvm			sg-b13f8f60				x86_64
RESERVATION	r-37d72b02	763039098776	DockerStack2-DockerSecurityGroup-RPH5XR0K7UXKS

[root@odc-c-11 ~]# euca-describe-groups --region account2-user11@
GROUP	sg-b13f8f60	763039098776	DockerStack-DockerSecurityGroup-FPL35DPY8UEUM	Security Group with Ingress Rule for DockerInstanc
